name: A Star Tale - Episode I
description:
From the beggining, because everything starts somewhere. Welcome to our first adventure. Welcome to A Star Tale - Episode 1.

Every week, a new adventure. Every adventure, one new episode. Every new episode, a whole new world.

A Star Tale, Episode I, made for the Mini Jam 62, with the theme Colors and limitation “only two frames per animation”.

Synopsis

A super powerful being is causing a catastrophe in the universe. A young boy was unaware, until it reached his home planet. The only way to save it is by travelling to 3 different worlds to get the Three Ancient Artefacts to fight the Enemy and save his planet (and the entire universe). 

  • Programming - Alan Floriano | Instagram
  • Music and SFX  - Artyom Kornev | Vimeo
  • LevelDesign, Original Voice Over, StoryTelling, Producer  - Rafa Parra  | Instagram
  • Character Art - Sr Heidgger | Instagram
  • Environment Art, GameDesign, UI - ZagoIris | Instagram
